segments.text: I hear Fred is a very good student in your class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Though he's not the one who can get the highest score , yet , on the whole , he is comparable to the best .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mean by on the whole .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I mean he's a student developing all round .
segments.speaker: S2
